Ben David

Aug 20, 20221. Index ETFs

These invest in stocks that correspond to a stock index e.g S&P 500. This is in an attempt to replicate the performance of the index.

2. Stock ETFs

These invest in a selection of stocks, commonly in an industry e.g energy, banking, technology.
